page.title: 21Cranleigh Junior school/St Nicolas approx 1963 to closure
page.content:
We went to school in the old Art Centre. Mr Blogg was the head and he had a room in the middle of the school up some very imposing steps. It was a long narrow room and as I remember always cluttered. If you were summoned to that room you may very well receive the cane! The loos were outside and revolting, I always waited until I could go home. We always went home for lunch and it was the main meal of the day. During morning break we had a small bottle of milk, sometimes,(my favourite)so cold it had small pieces of ice in it and sometimes luke warm as it had sat in the sun. I remember the teachers Miss Newberry, very kind, Mr Jenkins who threw chalk at you if you were not paying attention and Miss Matrevers .
Lesley
